title: What does the holocaust tell us about human psychology? - Quora

response.answer_text: It tells us that humans easily fall for lies. It tells us people are capable to kill babies who they never saw before. It tells us humans are willing to torture to the max. It tells us that many humans think they are better then others. It tells us many humans will do what ever some orders him or her. It tells us money is a good reason to kill some one. It tells us some people will risk their live to save a human. It tells us that some one you trusted could not be trusted. It tells us that some one you never thought of much could save your live. It tells us that politicians sacrifice generations of young people to get what they want. It tells us the hunted some times became the killer. It tells us the hunter sometimes became the rescuer.

Material prosperity and intellectual learning are not enough to quell our darkest impulses. We need more than that - a science of mind - to truly bring about peace within ourselves, and therefore, in the world at large.
